channel.title: Elite on DYREHAUGEN
channel.description: Recent content in Elite on DYREHAUGEN

item.title: Some Time Soon
item.description: Some Time Soon - things will be the same, but different. However, we did not notice the emerging change? - or did we? David Roberts tweet the day after the Trump-mob storm on Capitol: Feels like we’re trapped in a script, a play, that has been performed several times around the world recently. And even though we know exactly how the fall-of-democracy script plays out – every beat, every chapter – we’re just trapped, helpless, watching it play out
